product.title: IG INGLAM Hair Dryer Brush, 4-in-1 Detachable Blow Dryer Brush, Ionic Diffuser Hair Dryer & Styler Volumizer with Oval Titanium Barrel, One-Step Hot Air Blowout Brush, Dark Green C80
product.description: 4 in 1 Hair Dryer Brush Set for Drying/Straightening/Curling/Voluming, Oval Titanium Barrel, Hair Dryer, Hair Diffuser, Massage Comb
product.description_html: 4 in 1 Hair Dryer Brush Set for Drying/Straightening/Curling/Voluming, Oval Titanium Barrel, Hair Dryer, Hair Diffuser, Massage Comb
product.description_full:
4 in 1 Hair Dryer Brush Set for Drying/Straightening/Curling/Voluming, Oval Titanium Barrel, Hair Dryer, Hair Diffuser, Massage Comb * Multifunctional Hair Dryer Brush - The IG INGLAM 4 in 1 blowout brush is a multifunctional hair dryer brush that has four different-size brush heads to satisfy your styling needs. Served as a dryer, volumizer, curler, and straightener, it allows you to achieve gorgeous hairstyles efficiently, saving you time and money. | Interchangeable Brush Head Design - This hot air brush kit is equipped with 4 brush heads for drying, volumizing, straightening, and curling. Just press the button on the brush and you can easily change the brush head for different needs. | 3-Mode Heat Setting - With 3 adjustable heating levels, you can customize the temperature to achieve endless looks and styles. Low temperature or low wind for thin and fine hair. The cool setting for locking in your hair styling. High temp or high wind for thick and coarse hair. Temperature control allows you to choose the optimum one to fit your hair type. | Negative Ions Technology - Featured by a built-in generator that releases negative ions, the hair dryer brush head made of nylon bristles and nylon pins helps to maintain the neutral electric charge on the hair surface, reducing static and leaving healthy and shiny hair. | Safety & After-Sales Guarantee - The blow dryer brush meets U.S. safety requirements and proudly features the ETL Certification seal(1100W, 125V, 60Hz). Please note that the plastic smell of the brush is normal when used for the first time. As it is under one year warranty, you can feel free to contact us.
 * Multifunctional Hair Dryer Brush - The IG INGLAM 4 in 1 blowout brush is a multifunctional hair dryer brush that has four different-size brush heads to satisfy your styling needs. Low temperature or low wind for thin and fine hair. The cool setting for locking in your hair styling. High temp or high wind for thick and coarse hair. Please note that the plastic smell of the brush is normal when used for the first time. As it is under one year warranty, you can feel free to contact us.
 * Multifunctional Hair Dryer Brush - The IG INGLAM 4 in 1 blowout brush is a multifunctional hair dryer brush that has four different-size brush heads to satisfy your styling needs. Served as a dryer, volumizer, curler, and straightener, it allows you to achieve gorgeous hairstyles efficiently, saving you time and money. | Interchangeable Brush Head Design - This hot air brush kit is equipped with 4 brush heads for drying, volumizing, straightening, and curling. protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
